channel.title: Changing the ip client to my address automatically
channel.description:
right, if the sounds stupid ow well :p
ive got my 508 client, and an ip changer but everytime say u upload the ip changer u have to put in the adress
is there away maybe u can change or it able to say it at the top and they able to see it

item.title: Changing the ip client to my address automatically
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

chip, when ur online, and see this, how can i change the ip from an 508, ive got a clien and cnt find? :s

thanks in advance

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the ip client to my address automatically
item.dc:creator: @chip2010 chip2010
item.description:
@chip2010 wrote:

Nope sadly you cant you can either get a client of the server downloads and change the ip on that to yours but thats it :S

Hope i helped
